item.title: Biden Administration "Repeatedly Pressured" Meta: Mark Zuckerberg In Letter
item.description: In a letter to the US Congress, Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg has alleged that the US government under Joe Biden "repeatedly pressured" Meta to censor certain content on its platforms.

item.title: Elon Musk Asks X Staff To Prove Themselves To Get Stock Awards: Report
item.description: Billionaire Elon Musk has reportedly announced that employees at his social media company X (formerly Twitter) will receive their stock options based on their contributions.

item.title: A Mercedes-Benz Fire Jolts South Koreaâ€™s E.V. Transition
item.description: The government is aggressively promoting electric cars. But a dramatic blaze in an underground lot has left some potential buyers worried about safety.

item.title: Apple Watch 10: Everything we know so far, including blood pressure monitor rumor
